1.req: Have 2 ships in your main fleet

3.req: Consists of a Light Cruiser as your flagship and 3 Destroyers

5.namejp: 軽巡2隻を擁する隊を編成せよ！
5.nameen: Organize a Fleet of 2 Light Cruisers
5.req: Have 2 Light Cruisers in your fleet

6.req: Have a flagship in your second fleet

7.req: Have 2 Heavy Cruisers in your fleet (Aviation Cruisers don't count)

8.namejp: 「天龍」型軽巡姉妹の全2艦を編成せよ！
8.nameen: Organize both Sisters of the Tenryuu-class Light Cruisers
8.req: Have Tenryuu and Tatsuta in your main fleet

9.req: Have a Seaplane Tender in your fleet

10.req: Have ONLY Akatsuki, Hibiki, Ikazuchi and Inazuma in your second fleet

11.namejp: 第2艦隊で空母機動部隊を編成せよ！
11.nameen: Organize a Carrier Task Force in Your Second Fleet
11.req: Have an Aircraft Carrier / Light Aircraft Carrier and 3 Destroyers in your SECOND fleet

12.req: Have an Aircraft Carrier / Light Aircraft Carrier and 3 Destroyers in your main fleet

13.namejp: 戦艦と重巡による主力艦隊を編成せよ！
13.nameen: Organize the Main Fleet with a Battleship and Heavy Cruisers
13.req: Have a Battleship and 2 Heavy Cruisers in your main fleet(Aviation Battleships don't count)

14.namejp: 「川内」型軽巡姉妹の全3艦を編成せよ！
14.nameen: Organize All 3 Sisters of the Sendai-class Light Cruisers
14.req: Have Sendai, Jintsuu, and Naka in your main fleet

15.namejp: 「妙高」型重巡姉妹の全4隻を編成せよ！
15.nameen: Organize All 4 Sisters of the Myoukou-class Heavy Cruisers
15.req: Have Myoukou, Nachi, Ashigara, and Haguro in your main fleet

16.namejp: 「金剛」型による高速戦艦部隊を編成せよ！
16.nameen: Organize a Fast Battleship Force with the Kongou-class
16.req: Have Kongou, Hiei, Haruna, and Kirishima in your main fleet

17.namejp: 「扶桑」型戦艦姉妹の全2隻を編成せよ！
17.nameen: Organize Both Sisters of the Fusou-class Battleships
17.req: Have Fusou and Yamashiro in your main fleet

18.namejp: 「伊勢」型戦艦姉妹の全2隻を編成せよ！
18.nameen: Organize Both Sisters of the Ise-class Battleships
18.req: Have Ise and Hyuuga in your main fleet

19.nameen: Organize the Nagumo Carrier Task Force
19.req: Have ONLY Akagi, Kaga, Hiryuu, and Souryuu in your main fleet

20.req: Have Choukai, Aoba, Kako, Furutaka, and Tenryuu in your main fleet, with one additional FAST ship

21.req: Have Takao, Atago, Choukai, and Maya in your main fleet

22.req: Have Fusou, Yamashiro, Mogami, and Shigure in your main fleet

23.req: Have both Shoukaku, Zuikaku, and 2 Destroyers in your main fleet

24.namejp: 新「三川艦隊」を編成せよ！
24.req: Have Choukai, Aoba, Kinugasa, Kako, Furutaka, and Tenryuu in your main fleet

25.req: Have 2 Submarines in any one of your fleets

26.namejp: 航空水上打撃艦隊を編成せよ！
26.nameen: Organize an Aviation Surface Attack Fleet
26.req: Have ONLY 2 Aviation Battleships and 2 Aviation Cruisers in your main fleet

27.namejp: 中規模潜水艦隊を編成せよ！
27.req: Have 3 Submarines in any one of your fleets

28.req: Have Furutaka, Kako, Kinugasa, and Aoba in your main fleet

29.req: Have Nachi, Ashigara, Tama, and Kiso in your main fleet

30.req: Have Abukuma, Akebono, Ushio, Kasumi, and Shiranui in your main fleet

31.req: Have ONLY Asashio, Michishio, Ooshio, and Arashio in your main fleet

32.req: Have ONLY Kasumi, Arare, Kagerou, and Shiranui in your main fleet

33.namejp: 「第三十駆逐隊（第一次）」を編成せよ！
33.req: Have ONLY Mutsuki, Kisaragi, Yayoi, and Mochizuki in your main fleet

34.namejp: 「第三十駆逐隊(第二次)」を編成せよ！
34.req: Have ONLY Mutsuki, Yayoi, Uzuki, and Mochizuki in your main fleet

35.req: Have Myoukou, Nachi, and Haguro in your main fleet

36.namejp: 新編「第二航空戦隊」を編成せよ！
36.req: Have Hiryuu Kai Ni as flagship, Souryuu and 2 Destroyers in your main fleet

37.namejp: 潜水艦隊「第六艦隊」を編成せよ！
37.req: Have a Submarine Tender as flagship and 4 Submarines or more in your main fleet

38.req: Have Myoukou Kai Ni as flagship

39.namejp: 再編成「第二航空戦隊」を強化せよ！
39.req: Have Souryuu Kai Ni as flagship with Hiryuu Kai Ni and 2 Destroyers in your main fleet

40.namejp: 精鋭「第三戦隊」全艦集結せよ！
40.nameen: Gather All of the Elite 3rd Battleship Division
40.req: Have Kongou Kai Ni, Hiei Kai Ni, Haruna Kai Ni, and Kirishima Kai Ni in your main fleet

41.nameen: Deploy the New Standard Aircraft Carrier Class
41.req: Have Unryuu in your fleet as flagship

42.namejp: 主力戦艦部隊「第二戦隊」を編成せよ！
42.nameen: Organize the Main Battleship Force: "The 2nd Squadron"
42.req: Have Nagato, Mutsu, Fusou, and Yamashiro in your main fleet

43.namejp: 戦艦を主力とした水上打撃部隊を編成せよ！
43.nameen: Organize a Surface Task Force with Battleships Comprising the Main Force
43.req: Have 3 of any ship from either the Nagato, Ise, Fusou, or Yamato classes and 1 Light Cruiser in your main fleet

44.req: Have Fusou, Yamashiro, Mogami, Shigure, and Michishio in your main fleet

45.req: Have Akashi as flagship in your main fleet

46.namejp: 軽快な「水上反撃部隊」を編成せよ！
46.nameen: Organize a Light Surface Counterattack Fleet
46.req: Have Kasumi as flagship, Ashigara, 1 Light Cruiser, and 3 Destroyers in your main fleet

47.req: Have ONLY Fubuki, Shirayuki, Hatsuyuki, and Murakumo in your main fleet

48.req: Have ONLY Hatsuharu, Hatsushimo, Nenohi, and Wakaba in your main fleet

49.req: Have ONLY Satsuki, Fumizuki, Nagatsuki, and 1 more Destroyer in your main fleet

50.namejp: 「三川艦隊」を新編、突入準備せよ！
50.nameen: Reorganize the Mikawa Fleet and Prepare to Rush in
50.req: Have Choukai Kai Ni as flagship and fill the rest of the fleet with any combination of Furutaka, Kako, Aoba, Kinugasa, Yuubari, or Tenryuu for a total of 6 ships.

51.req: Have Tenryuu, Tatsuta, and at least two other ships in your fleet

52.namejp: 海上突入部隊を編成せよ！
52.req: Have Hiei, Kirishima, Nagara, Akatsuki, Ikazuchi, and Inazuma in your main fleet

53.namejp: 新編「第六駆逐隊」を編成せよ！
53.req: Have only Akatsuki Kai Ni as flagship with Hibiki (Верный is ok), Ikazuchi, and Inazuma in your main fleet

54.namejp: 「第一水雷戦隊」北方突入準備！
54.nameen: 1st Torpedo Squadron, Prepare for a Rush to the Northern Sea
54.req: Have Abukuma as flagship with Hibiki (Верный is ok), Hatsushimo, Wakaba, Samidare and Shimakaze in your main fleet

55.namejp: 「第一水雷戦隊」北方再突入準備！
55.nameen: 1st Torpedo Squadron, Prepare for Another Rush to the Northern Sea
55.req: Have Abukuma Kai Ni as flagship with Hibiki (Верный is ok), Yuugumo, Naganami, Akigumo and Shimakaze in your main fleet

56.namejp: 「第五航空戦隊」を再編成せよ！
56.req: Have Shoukaku, Zuikaku, Oboro and Akigumo in your main fleet

57.namejp: 新編「第二一戦隊」出撃準備！
57.nameen: Prepare the New 21st Squadron for Sortie
57.req: Have Nachi Kai Ni, Ashigara Kai Ni, Tama and Kiso in your main fleet

58.namejp: 「第十六戦隊(第一次)」を編成せよ！
58.req: Have Ashigara as flagship with Kuma and Nagara in your main fleet

59.req: Have Zuikaku Kai as flagship, Zuihou, Chitose Carrier and Chiyoda Carrier (both as CVL, not AV) in your main fleet

60.req: Have Ise Kai and Hyuuga Kai in your main fleet

61.req: Have Zuikaku Kai as flagship, Zuihou Kai, Chitose Carrier, Chiyoda Carrier, Ise Kai and Hyuuga Kai in your main fleet

62.namejp: 新航空戦隊を編成せよ！
62.req: Have Zuikaku Kai Ni, Shoukaku Kai Ni and two Destroyers in your fleet

63.namejp: 「第十六戦隊(第二次)」を編成せよ！
63.req: Have Natori as flagship, Isuzu and Kinu in your fleet

64.namejp: 「新編成航空戦隊」を編成せよ！
64.req: Have 2 Aircraft Carrier / Light Aircraft Carrier, 2 Aviation Battleships or Aviation Cruisers and 2 Destroyers in your fleet

65.namejp: 精強な「水上反撃部隊」を再編成せよ！
65.nameen: Reorganize the Strengthened Surface Counterattack Fleet
65.req: Have Kasumi as flagship, Ashigara, Ooyodo, Asashimo and Kiyoshimo in your fleet

66.namejp: 「第三十一戦隊(第一次)」を編成せよ！
66.req: Have Isuzu Kai Ni as flagship, Satsuki Kai Ni and Uzuki Kai in your fleet

67.req: Have ONLY Shiratsuyu Kai, Shigure, Harusame and Samidare in your fleet, with Shiratsuyu set as the flagship.

68.namejp: 強行高速輸送部隊を編成せよ！
68.nameen: Organise a Forced High-speed Transport Fleet!
68.req: Have Sendai Kai Ni as flagship, Kawakaze Kai Ni, Shigure Kai Ni and two other destroyers in your fleet.

69.namejp: 新編「水雷戦隊」を含む艦隊を再編成せよ！
69.req: Have a CL/CLT/CT as the flagship and 4 DD in any of your fleets.

70.namejp: 新編「第八駆逐隊」を再編成せよ！
70.req: Have  ONLY Asashio Kai Ni/Asashio Kai Ni D as flagship, Michishio, Ooshio and Arashio in your fleet. It doesn't have to be the main fleet.

71.req: Have Asashio Kai Ni D and Ooshio Kai Ni in your fleet.

72.req: Have Isonami, Uranami, Ayanami and Shikinami in your fleet.

73.namejp: 「第十六戦隊(第三次)」を編成せよ！
73.req: Have Kinu, Aoba, Kitakami and Ooi in your fleet.

74.namejp: 精鋭「第十六戦隊」を再編成せよ！
74.req: Have Kinu Kai Ni as flagship, then put five of the following ships into your fleet as escort:Kitakami Kai Ni, Ooi Kai Ni, Kuma Kai, Aoba Kai, Uranami Kai, Shikinami Kai.

76.namejp: 鎮守府正面海域を護れ！
76.nameen: Guard the Sea in Front of the Naval Base
76.req: Sortie to World 1-1 and clear the stage

78.namejp: 南西諸島沖に出撃せよ！
78.nameen: Sortie to World 1-2 and clear the stage
78.req: Sortie to World 1-2 , defeat the boss and clear the stage

79.namejp: 接近する「敵前衛艦隊」を迎撃せよ！
79.nameen: Intercept the Approaching Enemy Vanguard Fleet
79.req: Sortie to World 1-2 AGAIN and clear the stage

80.req: Sortie a Light Cruiser as flagship and 3 Destroyers

81.req: Sortie a fleet with a Heavy Cruiser as flagship

82.req: Sortie a fleet with a Battleship as flagship. Aviation Battleships (BBVs) don't count

83.req: Sortie a Light or Standard Carrier flagship and 5 Light Cruisers, Destroyers, or Seaplane Tenders

84.req: Sink an enemy Aircraft Carrier / Light Aircraft Carrier.

85.req: Sortie Choukai, Aoba, Kako, Furutaka, and Tenryuu, with one additional fast ship to any map

86.req: Sortie ONLY Akatsuki, Hibiki, Ikazuchi, and Inazuma to any map

87.req: Sortie Takao, Atago, Maya, Choukai, and 2 additional ships to World 2-2 and defeat the boss

88.req: Sortie Fusou, Yamashiro, Mogami, Shigure, and 2 additional ships to World 2-3 and defeat the boss

89.req: Sortie Shoukaku, Zuikaku, and 4 additional ships to World 3-1 and defeat the boss

90.req: Sortie Choukai, Furutaka, Kako, Aoba, Kinugasa, and Tenryuu to World 2-3 and defeat the boss

91.req: Sortie 2 Submarines and 4 additional ships to World 2-3 and defeat the boss

92.namejp: 「航空水上打撃艦隊」出撃せよ！
92.nameen: Sortie an Aviation Surface Attack Fleet
92.req: Sortie 2 Aviation Cruisers, 2 Aviation Battleships, and 2 additional ships to World 4-2 and defeat the boss

93.req: Sortie Aoba, Furutaka, Kako, Kinugasa, and 2 additional ships to World 2-3 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss

94.req: Sortie Arashio, Asashio, Michishio, Ooshio, and 2 additional ships to World 2-3 and defeat the boss

95.req: Sortie Arare, Kagerou, Kasumi, Shiranui, and 2 additional ships to World 3-1 and defeat the boss

96.namejp: 「第三十駆逐隊(第一次)」出撃せよ！
96.req: Sortie Mutsuki, Kisaragi, Mochizuki, Yayoi, and 2 additional Destroyers (or Destroyer and Light Cruiser flagship) to World 3-2 and obtain a C-Rank or better at the boss

97.req: Sortie a fleet with at least 2 Aviation Battleships to World 4-4 and defeat the boss

98.req: Sortie Mutsuki, Mochizuki, Uzuki, and Yayoi to World 1-5 and obtain a C-Rank or better at the boss

99.namejp: 新編「第二航空戦隊」出撃せよ！
99.req: Sortie Hiryuu Kai Ni as flagship, Souryuu (Kai or Kai-2 is ok), and 2 Destroyers (you may add additional ships) to World 5-2 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss

100.namejp: 精鋭「第二航空戦隊」抜錨せよ！
100.req: Sortie Souryuu Kai Ni as flagship, Hiryuu Kai Ni, 2 Destroyers, and 2 additional ship to World 4-3 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss

101.req: Sortie Haruna Kai Ni and 5 additional ships to World 5-1 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss

102.req: Sortie Unryuu Kai and 5 additional ships to World 5-2 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss

103.req: Sortie 1-2 Light Carriers, 1 Light Cruiser, and 3-4 Destroyers to World 2-1 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss

104.namejp: 「水雷戦隊」バシー島沖緊急展開
104.nameen: The Torpedo Squadron Bashi Island Emergency Deployment
104.req: Sortie 1-2 Light Cruisers, which one of must be the flagship, and 4-5 Destroyers to World 2-2 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss

105.req: Sortie Fusou, Mutsu, Nagato, Yamashiro, and 2 additional ships to World 4-2 and obtain two S-Rank victories at the boss

106.namejp: 「戦艦部隊」北方海域に突入せよ！
106.nameen: Rush the Battleship Force to the Northern Sea
106.req: Sortie 2 Battleships (Aviation Battleships do not count), 1 Light Carrier, and 3 additional ships to World 3-5 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss

107.namejp: 「西村艦隊」南方海域へ進出せよ！
107.nameen: Advance the Nishimura Fleet to the Southern Sea
107.req: Sortie Fusou, Yamashiro, Mogami, Shigure, Michishio, and 1 additional ship to World 5-1, and obtain an S-Rank at the boss

108.namejp: 「第六戦隊」南西海域へ出撃せよ！
108.nameen: Sortie the 6th Squadron to the Southwestern Sea
108.req: Sortie Furutaka, Kako, Aoba, Kinugasa and 2 additional ships to World 2-5 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss

109.namejp: 「第十一駆逐隊」 出撃せよ！
109.req: Sortie Fubuki, Shirayuki, Hatsuyuki, Murakumo, and 2 additional ships to World 2-3 and defeat the boss

110.req: Sortie Fubuki, Shirayuki, Hatsuyuki, and Murakumo to World 1-5 and obtain at least a C or above Rank at the boss

111.req: Sortie Hatsuharu, Nenohi, Wakaba, Hatsushimo, and 2 additional ships to World 3-1 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss

112.req: Sortie Nachi as flagship, Hatsushimo, Kasumi, Ushio, Akebono, and 1 other ship to World 2-2 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss

113.req: Sortie Satsuki, Fumizuki, Nagatsuki, 1 other Destroyer, and 2 other additional ships to World 1-4 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss

114.nameen: Sortie the Remodeled Anti-Air Heavy Cruiser
114.req: Sortie Maya (Kai or Kai-2), 1 Light Cruiser, and 2 Destroyers (you may add additional ships) to World 2-3 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss

115.namejp: 新編「三川艦隊」ソロモン方面へ！
115.nameen: Sortie the New Mikawa Fleet to the Solomon Waters
115.req: Sortie Choukai Kai Ni as flagship and any combination of Furutaka, Kako, Aoba, Kinugasa, Yuubari, or Tenryuu to World 5-1 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss (One of them will have to be left out)

116.namejp: 「第六駆逐隊」対潜哨戒なのです！
116.nameen: The 6th Destroyer Division Anti-Submarine Patrol nanodesu
116.req: Sortie Akatsuki, Hibiki (Верный is ok), Ikazuchi, and Inazuma to World 1-5 and obtain a C-Rank or better at the boss

117.req: Sortie Tenryuu, Tatsuta, and at least two other ships to World 2-3 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss

118.namejp: 海上突入部隊、進発せよ！
118.req: Sortie Hiei, Kirishima, Nagara, Akatsuki, Ikazuchi, and Inazuma to World 5-1 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss

119.namejp: 「第六駆逐隊」対潜哨戒を徹底なのです！
119.nameen: A Thorough 6th Destroyer Division Anti-Submarine Patrol nanodesu
119.req: Sortie Akatsuki Kai Ni, Hibiki (Верный is ok), Ikazuchi, and Inazuma to World 1-5 and obtain an A-Rank or better at the boss

120.namejp: 「第一水雷戦隊」ケ号作戦、突入せよ！
120.nameen: Rush the 1st Torpedo Squadron to Operation KE
120.req: Sortie  Abukuma as flagship with Hibiki (Верный is ok), Hatsushimo, Wakaba, Samidare and Shimakaze to World 3-2 and obtain a victory (B-Rank or better) at the boss

121.namejp: 「第一水雷戦隊」北方ケ号作戦、再突入！
121.nameen: Rush the 1st Torpedo Squadron to Operation KE Again
121.req: Sortie  Abukuma Kai Ni as flagship with Hibiki (Верный is ok), Yuugumo, Naganami, Akigumo and Shimakaze to World 3-2 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss

122.namejp: 鎮守府正面の対潜哨戒を強化せよ！
122.nameen: Strengthen the Anti-Submarine Patrol in Front of the Naval Base!
122.req: Sortie to World 1-5 and obtain four A-Ranks (or better) at the boss.

123.namejp: 「空母機動部隊」北方海域に進出せよ！
123.nameen: "Carrier Task Force", advance to the Northern Sea!
123.req: Sortie a fleet with an aircraft carrier as flagship to World 3-5 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss

124.namejp: 「第五航空戦隊」珊瑚諸島沖に出撃せよ！
124.nameen: Sortie the 5th Carrier Division to the Southern Sea Coral Islands
124.req: Sortie Shoukaku, Zuikaku, Oboro, Akigumo and up to 2 additional ships to World 5-2 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss

125.namejp: 新編「第二一戦隊」北方へ出撃せよ！
125.nameen: Sortie the New 21st Squadron to the North
125.req: Sortie Nachi Kai Ni, Ashigara Kai Ni, Tama, Kiso and up to 2 additional ships to World 3-1 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss

126.namejp: 「第十六戦隊(第一次)」出撃せよ！
126.req: Sortie Ashigara as flagship, Kuma, Nagara and up to 3 additional ships to World 2-2 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss

127.namejp: 「第三航空戦隊」南西諸島防衛線に出撃！
127.nameen: 3rd Carrier Division: defend the Nansei Islands
127.req: Sortie Zuikaku Kai as flagship, Zuihou, Chitose Carrier and Chiyoda Carrier (both as CVL) (you can add 2 more ships) to World 1-4 and score an S-rank victory at the boss

128.req: Sortie Zuikaku Kai(Kai Ni is OK) as flagship, Zuihou Kai, Chitose Carrier,Chiyoda Carrier, Ise Kai and Hyuuga Kai to World 2-4 and score an S-rank victory at the boss
128.otherrew: 3xBucket Zero Fighter Model 52C (601 Air Group)

129.namejp: 「第十六戦隊(第二次)」出撃せよ！
129.req: Sortie Natori as flagship, Isuzu, Kinu and up to 3 additional ships to World 2-3 and score an S-rank victory at the boss

130.namejp: 新編成航空戦隊、北方へ進出せよ！
130.nameen: Sortie the New Carrier Division to the North
130.req: Sortie 2 Aircraft Carriers or Light Aircraft Carriers, 2 Aviation Battleships or Aviation Cruisers and 2 Destroyers to World 3-3 and score an S-rank victory at the boss

131.req: Sortie Kasumi as flagship, Ashigara, Ooyodo, Asashimo, Kiyoshimo and up to one additional ship to World 2-5 and score an S-rank victory at the boss

132.namejp: 旗艦「霞」北方海域を哨戒せよ！
132.nameen: Send the Flagship Kasumi to Patrol the Northern Sea
132.req: Sortie a fleet with Kasumi Kai Ni as flagship, 3 DD and up to 2 additional ships to World 3-1 and score a victory at the boss node.
132.otherrew: Type 13 Air Radar Kai Combat Ration

133.namejp: 旗艦「霞」出撃！敵艦隊を撃滅せよ！
133.nameen: Flagship Kasumi, Sortieing! Destroy the Enemy Fleet
133.req: Sortie a fleet with Kasumi Kai Ni as flagship, 2 DD and up to 3 additional ships to World 2-5 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.
133.otherrew: 3xScrew 25mm Triple Autocannon Mount (Concentrated Deployment)

134.req: Sortie Isuzu Kai Ni as flagship, Satsuki Kai Ni, Uzuki Kai and up to 3 additional ships to World 1-6 and reach the end node

135.req: Sortie Shiratsuyu Kai as flagship, Shigure, Harusame and Samidare and up to 2 additional ships to World 2-3 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss

136.namejp: 強襲上陸作戦用戦力を増強せよ！
136.nameen: Bolster the Capability for Amphibious Assault Operations!
136.req: Sortie to World 6-3 and obtain an B-Rank or better at the boss

137.namejp: 製油所地帯を防衛せよ！
137.req: Sortie a torpedo squadron (1 CL 5 DD) to World 1-3 and obtain three S-Ranks at the boss

138.namejp: 南西諸島防衛線を強化せよ！
138.nameen: Reinforce the Nansei Islands Defence Line!
138.req: Sortie to World 1-4 and obtain five S-Ranks at the boss

139.namejp: オリョール海の制海権を確保せよ！
139.nameen: Secure Control of the Orel Sea!
139.req: Sortie a fleet with Ooshio (model doesn't matter) as flagship to World 2-3 and obtain six S-Ranks at the boss

140.req: Sortie a fleet with Ooshio Kai Ni as flagship to World 3-5 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss

141.req: Sortie a fleet to World 2-2 and World 2-3 and obtain an S-Rank at both bosses.

142.namejp: 強行高速輸送部隊、出撃せよ！
142.req: Sortie a fleet with Sendai Kai Ni, Kawakaze Kai Ni, Shigure Kai Ni, two other destroyers and up to one wildcard to World 4-1 and obtain at least an A-Rank at the boss.

143.req: Sortie a fleet with Akagi as flagship, Kaga and up to four wildcards to World 4-5 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss.

144.namejp: 新編艦隊、南西諸島防衛線へ急行せよ！
144.nameen: Set Sail Towards the Nansei Islands Defence Line
144.req: Sortie a fleet with a CL/CLT/CT flagship, 4 DD, and up to 1 additional ship to World 1-4 and obtain at least an A-rank at the boss.

145.namejp: 鎮守府近海航路の安全確保を強化せよ！
145.nameen: Ensure the Safety of the Naval Base's Nearby Routes
145.req: Sortie a fleet with a CL flagship, 4 DD, and up to 1 additional ship to World 1-6 and complete the map.

146.namejp: 「第三十一戦隊」敵潜を制圧せよ！
146.nameen: 31st Cruiser Division, suppress the enemy submarines!
146.req: Sortie a fleet with Isuzu Kai Ni as flagship, Satsuki Kai Ni, Uzuki Kai, and three wildcards to World 1-6 and reach the goal point twice.

147.namejp: 新編「第八駆逐隊」出撃せよ！
147.req: Sortie a fleet with Asashio Kai Ni/Asashio Kai Ni D as flagship, Michishio, Ooshio, Arashio, and two wildcards to World 1-6 and reach the goal point.

148.namejp: 精鋭「八駆第一小隊」対潜哨戒！
148.nameen: Elite 8th Destroyer Division on ASW patrol!
148.req: Sortie a fleet that includes Asashio Kai Ni D and Ooshio Kai Ni to World 1-5 and score two S-Ranks at the boss node.

149.namejp: 水雷戦隊、南西諸島防衛線に反復出撃せよ！
149.nameen: Torpedo Squadron, repeatedly sortie to the Nansei Islands defence line!
149.req: Sortie a fleet with light cruiser type (i.e. CL/CLT/CT) as flagship, four destroyers and a wildcard to World 1-4 and score two S-Ranks at the boss node.

150.namejp: 製油所地帯沿岸の哨戒を実施せよ！
150.req: Sortie a fleet with a light aircraft carrier as flagship, three destroyers and two wildcards to World 1-3 and score an S-Rank at the boss node.

151.namejp: 水雷戦隊、南西諸島海域を哨戒せよ！
151.nameen: Torpedo Squadron, patrol the Nansei Islands area!
151.req: Sortie a fleet with a light cruiser as flagship, four destroyers and one wildcard to both World 2-2 and World 2-3, and score an S-Rank at each boss node.

152.req: Sortie a fleet with Isonami, Uranami, Ayanami and Shikinami to World 1-5, and score at least an A-Rank at the boss node. Because of the branching rules you can have only these four in your fleet.

153.namejp: 「第十九駆逐隊」敵主力に突入せよ！
153.nameen: 19th Destroyer Division, engage the enemy main forces!
153.req: Sortie a fleet with Isonami, Uranami, Ayanami, Shikinami and up to two wildcards to World 2-5, and score at least an A-Rank at the boss node.

154.namejp: 飛行場設営の準備を実施せよ！
154.nameen: Prepare for the Construction of the Land-Base!
154.req: Sortie to World 6-3 and obtain an S-rank at the boss node.

155.namejp: 夜間突入！敵上陸部隊を叩け！
155.nameen: Rush into Night Battle! Attack the Enemy Landing Forces!
155.req: Sortie to World 5-3 and obtain at least an A-rank at the boss node.

156.namejp: 夜の海を照らす「灯り」を入手せよ！
156.nameen: Obtain the Searchlight that brightens the Dark Sea!
156.req: Sortie to World 2-1 and obtain an S-rank at the boss node.

157.namejp: 南西諸島防衛線を増強せよ！
157.nameen: Reinforce the Nansei Islands Defense Line!
157.req: Sortie a fleet with an AV or CAV as flagship and up to five wildcards to World 1-4 and obtain an S-rank at the boss node.

158.namejp: 「第十六戦隊(第三次)」出撃せよ！
158.req: Sortie a fleet with Kinu, Aoba, Kitakami, Ooi and up to two wildcards to World 2-4 and obtain at least an A-Rank at the boss node.
158.otherrew: Irako Furniture: Ship Girl Cushion Floor

159.namejp: 精鋭「第十六戦隊」突入せよ！
159.nameen: Elite 16th Cruiser Division, engage the enemy!
159.req: Sortie a fleet with Kinu Kai Ni as flagship and any combination of  Kitakami Kai Ni, Ooi Kai Ni, Kuma Kai, Aoba Kai, Uranami Kai or Shikinami Kai to World 2-5 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss node.

160.namejp: 輸送作戦を成功させ、帰還せよ！
160.nameen: Complete a transport mission and return!
160.req: Sortie a fleet with Kinu Kai Ni as flagship, Uranami Kai, exactly three other destroyers, and up to one wildcard (not a DD) to World 2-2 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss node.

161.req: Sortie a CA(V) as flagship, three other CA(V), and two additional ships to World 2-3 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss node.

162.req: Sortie a (F)BB(V) as flagship, 1 other (F)BB(V) and up to 4 additional ships to World 3-3 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss node. Due to the branching rules you're required to bring at least 2 CV(L).
162.otherrew: 2xScrew Type 2 Seaplane Fighter Kai or PBY-5A Catalina

163.namejp: 主力戦艦戦隊、抜錨せよ！
163.req: Sortie a fleet which includes 2 or more slow BB/BBV Obtain S-Rank Victory at the Boss node of World 2-4
163.otherrew: Irako Improved Kanhon Type TurbineorEnhanced Kanhon Type Boiler

164.namejp: 精鋭「第八駆逐隊」突入せよ！
164.req: Sortie a Fleet with Arashio Kai Ni as Flagship, which includes at least one of either Asashio, Ooshio or Michishio as well. Sortie to World 5-5 and obtain 2 A-rank or higher victories!

166.namejp: 敵艦隊主力を撃滅せよ！
166.nameen: Destroy the Main Force of the Enemy Fleet

168.req: Sink 3 enemy Aircraft Carriers.Light Carriers are fine tooArmored Carrier Princess does not workNeed to verify for Seaplane Tender Princess

169.namejp: 敵補給艦を3隻撃沈せよ！

171.namejp: 南西諸島海域の制海権を握れ！
171.nameen: Seize Control of the Southwestern Archipelago Sea
171.req: Defeat 5 boss nodes in World 2: 南西諸島海域

173.req: Launch your fleet 36 times, encounter 24 bosses, kill 12 bosses, and get 6 S-Rank victories

174.req: Sink 20 Aircraft Carriers.Light Carriers are fine too

178.namejp: 敵東方艦隊を撃滅せよ！
178.req: Defeat 12 bosses in the World 4: 西方海域

179.namejp: 敵北方艦隊主力を撃滅せよ！
179.nameen: Destroy the Main Force of the Enemy's Northern Fleet
179.req: Defeat 5 bosses in the Northern Sea 3-3, 3-4, or 3-5
179.otherrew: Medium Furniture Box 3xDevelopment Material 3xScrew

180.namejp: 敵東方中枢艦隊を撃破せよ！
180.nameen: Crush the Core of the Enemy's Eastern Fleet

181.namejp: 南方海域珊瑚諸島沖の制空権を握れ！
181.nameen: Seize Air Superiority on the Southern Sea Coral Islands
181.req: Sortie to 5-2 and get an S-Rank at the boss node 2 times

182.namejp: 海上輸送路の安全確保に努めよ！
182.nameen: Strive to Ensure the Security of the Marine Transportation Route
182.req: Sortie to 1-5 and get at least an A-rank at the boss node 3 times

183.req: Sortie Myoukou, Nachi, Haguro, and 3 additional ships to World 2-5 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss

184.req: Sortie to World 6-1 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss three times

185.req: Sortie 1-3 Light Cruisers, with one as flagship, and 3-5 Destroyers to World 1-4 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss

186.req: Sortie only 3 of the following classes: Yamato-class, Nagato-class, Ise-class and Fusou-class Slow Battleships, 1 Light Cruiser, and 2 additional ships to World 5-1 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss.

187.nameen: Month-long Strengthening of the Marine Escort
187.req: Sortie to World 1-5 and obtain an A-Rank or higher at the boss 10 times

188.req: Sortie 2 Aircraft Carriers (CVL/CV/CVB), 2 Destroyers, and 2 additional ships to World 4-2 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss

189.nameen: Send in the Surface Counterattack Fleet
189.req: Sortie a Destroyer as flagship, 1 Heavy Cruiser (CAVs don't count), 1 Light Cruiser, and 3 other Destroyers to World 2-5 and obtain an S-Rank at the boss

190.req: Sortie a fleet to World 2-4 and obtain two S-Ranks at the boss node.

191.namejp: 冬季特別任務：精鋭「駆逐隊」、出撃！
191.req: Sortie 4 DD and S-Rank the bosses at World 1-1 and World 1-2.※No wildcards are allowed. Available only until January 10th, 2017.
191.otherrew: Furniture Fairy 25mm Triple Autocannon Mount ★+3orAnti-torpedo Bulge (Large)

192.namejp: 冬季特別任務：水上機母艦、抜錨せよ！
192.req: Sortie 1 AV as flagship and 3 DD, with 2 ships of your choice. S-Rank the bosses at World 1-3 and World 1-4. Available only until January 10th, 2017.
192.otherrew: Reinforcement Expansion Furniture: Rice Croquette Dinner

193.namejp: 謹賀新年！「水雷戦隊」出撃始め！
193.nameen: Happy New Year! Torpedo Squadron, Sortie Start!
193.req: Sortie 1 CL as flagship and at least 2 or more DD. S-Rank the bosses at World 1-2, World 1-3, and World 1-4. No wildcards are allowed.※Available only until January 10th, 2017.

194.namejp: 新春「伊良湖」のお手伝い！
194.nameen: Help Out Irako for the New Year!
194.req: Sortie a fleet which includes a Seaplane Tender (AV), Destroyer (DD), OR Submarine Tender (AS) as flagship, with 5 ships of your choice. S-Rank the boss at World 2-3 Three Times. Available only until January 10th, 2017.

195.namejp: 時代が来たか！航空火力艦なお正月！
195.nameen: The Age has come! Aviation Ships New Year!
195.req: Sortie a fleet which includes 2 BBV, 2 CAV and 2 ships of your choice. BBV must be Flagship. S-Rank the Boss at World 4-2 Three Times. Available only until January 10th, 2017.
195.otherrew: 3xScrew Furniture Fairy ShiunorRo. 43orOS2U

196.namejp: 迎春！「空母機動部隊」出撃開始！
196.nameen: Start of New Year! Aircraft Carrier Task Force, Sortie Out!
196.req: Sortie a fleet which includes 1 CV(B) as flagship with 2 DD and 3 ships of your choice. S-Rank the Boss at World 3-5 Three Times. Available only until January 10th, 2017.
196.otherrew: Skilled Crew Member Furniture: Secret New Year 2017 scroll

198.nameen: Increase the Level of Training by Exercising
198.req: Challenge 3 other fleets in Exercises (defeat is ok) within the same day

199.nameen: Overwhelm the Other Admirals through Exercises
199.req: Get 5 victories in Exercises within the same day

200.req: Get 20 victories in Exercises within the same week

201.namejp: 艦隊の練度向上に努めよ！
201.nameen: Strive to Increase the Level of the Fleet's Training
201.req: Get 3 victories in Exercises within the same day

202.namejp: 演習を強化、艦隊の練度向上に努めよ！
202.nameen: Continue Exercising, and Strive to Increase the Level of Fleet's Training
202.req: Get 4 victories in Exercises within the same day

203.namejp: 北方再突入に備え、練度向上に努めよ！
203.nameen: Strive to Increase the Level of Training in Preparation for Another Rush to the Northern Sea
203.req: Get 4 victories in Exercises within the same day

204.req: Get 7 victories in Exercises within the same day

205.req: Get 4 victories in Exercises within the same day

206.req: Get 8 victories in Exercises within the same day

207.req: Get 8 victories in Exercises within the same day

209.req: Perform 3 successful expeditions within the same day.

210.req: Perform 10 successful expeditions within the same day.
210.otherrew: Small Furniture Box Medium Furniture Box

211.req: Perform 30 successful expeditions within the same week.

212.namejp: 第一次潜水艦派遣作戦
212.req: Complete Expedition 30 for the first time

213.namejp: 第二次潜水艦派遣作戦

214.namejp: 潜水艦派遣作戦による技術入手の継続
214.nameen: Continue to Obtain Technology through Submarine Dispatch Operations

215.namejp: 潜水艦派遣による海外艦との接触作戦
215.nameen: Operation Contact Foreign Ship through Submarine Dispatch

216.namejp: 南方への輸送作戦を成功させよ！
216.nameen: Complete the Transport Operations towards South

217.namejp: 航空火力艦の運用を強化せよ！
217.nameen: Enhance the Use of Aviation Firepower

218.namejp: 南方への鼠輸送を継続実施せよ!
218.nameen: Continue Carrying Out the Rat Transportation (Tokyo Express) towards South
218.req: Complete Expedition 37 or 38 a total of 7 times in a week

219.namejp: (続)航空火力艦の運用を強化せよ！
219.nameen: (Continuation) Enhance the Use of Aviation Firepower

220.namejp: 遠洋潜水艦作戦を実施せよ！
220.nameen: Carry Out the Deep Sea Submarine Operations
220.otherrew: 53cm Submarine Bow Torpedo Mount (8 tubes)

221.namejp: 遠洋潜水艦作戦の成果を拡大せよ！
221.nameen: Expand the Result of the Deep Sea Submarine Operations
221.otherrew: 53cm Submarine Bow Torpedo Mount (8 tubes)

222.namejp: 防空射撃演習を実施せよ！
222.otherrew: 25mm Triple Autocannon Mount 2xDevelopment Material

223.namejp: 囮機動部隊支援作戦を実施せよ！
223.nameen: Carry Out the Decoy Task Force Support Operation
223.otherrew: Type 91 Anti-Aircraft Fire Director 2xDevelopment Material

224.namejp: 観艦式予行を実施せよ！

226.namejp: 機動部隊の運用を強化せよ！
226.nameen: Enhance the Use of the Task Force

227.namejp: 潜水艦派遣作戦による航空機技術入手
227.nameen: Submarine Dispatch Operation to Acquire Aircraft Technology

228.namejp: 潜水艦派遣作戦による噴式技術の入手
228.nameen: Submarine Dispatch Operation to Acquire Jet Engine Technology
228.req: Have 5,000 Steel and 1,500 Bauxite. Complete Expedition 30 and 31 once each. (The resources will be consumed upon Quest Completion)

232.req: Resupply 15 times (1 time is 1 click of the resupply button)

237.req: Craft a piece of equipment(Failures are OK)

239.nameen: Intensify the Concentration in Developing Equipment
239.req: Craft 3 pieces of equipment(Failures are OK)

240.nameen: Strengthen the Fleet by Constructing Shipgirls

242.nameen: Preparation for Large Ship Construction (Part II)

243.namejp: 輸送用ドラム缶の準備
243.nameen: Preparation for Transport Use Drum Canister

245.nameen: Model Conversion: Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Tomonaga Squadron)
245.req: Have flagship equipped with Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Tomonaga Squadron), then scrap 2 Tenzan. UNLOCK the plane before completing this quest if they are previously locked

246.nameen: Model Conversion: Type 99 Dive Bomber (Egusa Squadron)
246.req: Have flagship equipped with Type 99 Dive Bomber (Egusa Squadron), then scrap 2 Suisei. UNLOCK the plane before completing this quest if they are previously locked

247.nameen: Model Conversion: Zero Fighter Model 52C (601 Air Group)
247.req: Have flagship equipped with Zero Fighter Model 52C (601 Air Group), then scrap 2 Reppuu. UNLOCK the plane before completing this quest if they are previously locked

251.nameen: Model Conversion: Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Murata Squadron)
251.req: Have Shoukaku equipped with Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Murata Squadron) as flagship and then scrap 2 Tenzan. UNLOCK the plane before completing this quest if they are previously locked

252.namejp: 精鋭「九七式艦攻」部隊の編成
252.nameen: Organize the Elite Type 97 Torpedo Bomber Force
252.req: Have Shoukaku or Akagi as flagship and then scrap 3 Type 97 Torpedo Bomber

254.nameen: Organize the New Elite Fighter Force
254.req: Have Image in your item page and Equip a rank 7 Type 0 Fighter Model 21 on Houshou set as your Secretary Ship, then scrap 2 Type 0 Fighter Model 21 and a Type 96 Fighter. One Skilled crew is consumed in the process.

255.namejp: 試製航空艤装の追加試作

256.req: Equip a Type 0 Fighter Model 21 (Skilled) on a Carrier secretary, then scrap 2 Type 0 Fighter Model 52

257.req: Equip a rank 7 Type 0 Fighter Model 21 (Skilled) on a Carrier secretary, then scrap 2 Type 0 Fighter Model 52

258.namejp: 「艦戦」隊の再編成?「艦戦」隊の再編成
258.nameen: Reorganize the Fighter Force: Type 0 Fighter Model 52 (Skilled)
258.req: Equip a rank 7 Type 0 Fighter Model 52 (Skilled) on Zuikaku as secretary, then scrap Zero Fighter Model 52C (601 Air Group)

259.namejp: 機種転換＆部隊再編?機種転換＆部隊再編
259.nameen: Model Conversion & Reorganization: Zero Fighter Model 52C (w/ Iwai Flight)
259.req: Equip a rank 7 Zero Fighter Model 52C (w/ Iwai Flight) on Zuikaku as secretary, then scrap 2 Type 0 Fighter Model 62 (Fighter-bomber)

260.namejp: 「艦戦」隊の再編成?「艦戦」隊の再編成
260.nameen: Reorganize the Fighter Force: Type 0 Fighter Model 21 (Skilled)
260.req: Equip a rank 7 Type 0 Fighter Model 21 (Skilled) on Zuikaku as secretary, then scrap 2 Type 0 Fighter Model 21

261.nameen: Model Conversion: Zero Fighter Model 21 (w/ Iwamoto Flight)
261.req: Equip a rank 7 Zero Fighter Model 21 (w/ Iwamoto Flight) on Zuikaku as secretary, then scrap 2 Type 0 Fighter Model 52

262.namejp: 機種転換＆部隊再編?機種転換＆部隊再編
262.nameen: Model Conversion & Reorganization: Zero Fighter Model 52A (w/ Iwamoto Flight)
262.req: Equip a rank 7 Zero Fighter Model 52A (w/ Iwamoto Flight) on Zuikaku as secretary, then scrap 2 Saiun

265.namejp: 上陸戦用新装備の調達
265.nameen: Supply of New Landing Force Equipment
265.req: Scrap two 7.7mm Machine Gun and two 12.7mm Single Machine Gun Mount

266.namejp: 対空機銃量産?対空機銃量産

267.req: Set Houshou as secretary and equip her with a Type 96 Fighter that is both rank 7 and ★max. Consumes 2 medals. Consumes the equipment.

268.nameen: Development of a New Torpedo Armament
268.req: Set Shimakaze as secretary and equip her with a ★max 61cm Quintuple (Oxygen) Torpedo Mount and a ★max 61cm Triple (Oxygen) Torpedo Mount. Consumes 2 medals. Consumes the equipment.

269.nameen: Preparations for the Construction of an Air Base
269.req: Have two 7.7mm Machine Guns & two Type 96 Fighters in your inventory, and scrap two Drum Canisters. Equipment must be unlocked. Consumes the equipment.
269.otherrew: 3xDevelopment Material Type 96 Land-based Attack Aircraft

270.req: Have two 7.7mm Machine Guns & two Type 99 Dive Bombers in your inventory. Equipment must be unlocked. Consumes the equipment.

271.nameen: Supply of the Land-based Main Bomber Force
271.req: Have a Type 96 Land-based Attack Aircraft & two Type 97 Torpedo Bombers in your inventory, and scrap two Type 0 Fighters Model 21. Equipment must be unlocked. Consumes the equipment.

272.namejp: 「一式陸攻」性能向上型の調達
272.nameen: Procurement of the improved Type 1 Land-based Attack Aircraft
272.req: Have a Type 1 Land-based Attack Aircraft & two Tenzan in your inventory. Equipment must be unlocked. Consumes the equipment.

273.nameen: Monthly Procurement of Maritime Supply Goods
273.req: Have 750 fuel, 750 ammo, two Drum Canisters, one Type 91 AP Shell in your inventory, and scrap one Type 3 Shell. Equipment must be unlocked. Consumes all the resources and equipment.

274.req: Have 5000 Furniture Coins, two 25mm Twin Autocannon Mount, two 25mm Triple Autocannon Mount in your inventory, and scrap one 25mm Single Autocannon Mount. Equipment must be unlocked.

275.namejp: 中部海域「基地航空隊」展開！
275.nameen: Launch the LBAS to the Central Ocean Area
275.req: Scrap 2 drums, and system will eat 1200 Fuel , 3000 Bauxite and a Construction Corps

276.req: Scrap 2 12.7cm Twin High-angle Gun Mount, prepare 5000 furniture coin, 2 14cm Single Gun Mount + 2x 15.2cm Single Gun Mount (all are consumed upon Quest completion). Equipment must be unlocked.

277.nameen: Development of a New Reconnaissance Aircraft
277.req: Have one Type 1 Land-based Attack Aircraft, two Saiun in your inventory, and scrap two Type 0 Reconnaissance Seaplane. Equipment must be unlocked. Consumes all the equipment.

278.namejp: 噴式戦闘爆撃機の開発
278.req: Scrap 3 Shiden Kai 2, have 2 New Technology Aircraft Blueprint and 1 Ne Type Engine prepared. The New Technology Aircraft Blueprints & Ne Type Engine are consumed upon quest completion

279.nameen: Increased Production of the Ne-type Engine
279.req: Scrap 3 Type 0 Fighter Model 52. Prepare 2 Reppuu, 2 Ryuusei, and 8,000 steel. Equipment must be unlocked. Consumes the equipment.

280.nameen: Procurement of Custom made Furniture (Arsenal Quest)
280.req: Scrap 12.7cm Main Gun two times, prepare 5000 furniture coins, 2x 7.7mm AA Gun and 2x Type 96 Fighter. The Equipment and Furniture Coins will all be consumed upon quest completion.

281.namejp: はじめての「近代化改修」！

282.namejp: 艦の「近代化改修」を実施せよ！
282.req: Perform 2 successful modernizations within the same day

283.namejp: 「近代化改修」を進め、戦備を整えよ！
283.nameen: Proceed with Modernization, and Prepare for War
283.req: Perform 15 successful modernizations within the same week

284.nameen: Preparation for Large Ship Construction (Part I)

285.namejp: 航空艤装の近代化改修
285.req: Prepare 5500 steel & 2500 bauxite, then perform 2 successful modernizations on a CV(B) each with 5 carriers as material. Modernisation target must be a CV(B), not CVL or AV. Modernisation materials can be CV or CVL, not AV.

288.req: Have a level 90 to 99 ship as your flagship

289.req: Defeat the boss in 2-3 with a Level 90-99 flagship (with S rank)

290.req: Have a Level 100 ship as your flagship along with five others in your main fleet

291.namejp: 二人でする初めての任務！
291.req: Defeat the boss in 4-3 with a level 100+ flagship (with S rank)

292.namejp: 潜水艦隊、中部海域の哨戒を実施せよ！
292.nameen: Submarine Fleet, patrol the Central Waters!
292.req: Sortie a Fleet consisting of 4 SS(V) with an SS(V) as flagship and 2 additional ships. Sortie to World 6-1 and score a victory at the boss node.

293.namejp: 重装甲巡洋艦、鉄底海峡に突入せよ！
293.nameen: Heavy Armored Cruiser, Embark into the Iron Bottom Sound!
293.req: Sortie Zara due as Flagship with 5 additional ships. Sortie to World 5-3 and score an A-rank or higher victory at the boss node.

294.namejp: 六三一空「晴嵐」隊の編成
294.req: Equip a Prototype Seiran in first slot and a Zuiun (631 Air Group) in second slot on either I-401, I-13 or I-14 as secretary.

295.req: Prepare 3x 61cm Quadruple (Oxygen) Torpedo Mount, 3x Type 93 Passive Sonar and 120 development materials in your inventory. Scrap 4x 61cm Triple Torpedo Mount.
295.otherrew: Late Model Bow Torpedo Mount (6 tubes)
